resource: 1002139.vtc=true 1002139.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002139.description=In certain areas, 4-cylinder automatic models are equipped as Partial Zero Emission Vehicles (PZEV).For Camry 4-cylinder models certified as Partial Zero Emission Vehicles (PZEV), all emissions components are covered for 15 years or 150,000 miles, whichever occurs first, for performance or defect. 1002139.derived=false
